items.content_html: 🚀 TicTask – A lightweight, open-source Pomodoro Timer & To-Do List Chrome extension with GitHub-style productivity analytics. Stay focused, track your progress, and share your streaks. Contribute & make productivity open for everyone!

items.content_html: MeoCord Framework - lightweight and extensible framework designed for building Discord bots. With its modular architecture, support for TypeScript, and seamless integration with Discord.js, MeoCord simplifies bot development with a focus on flexibility, scalability, and modularity.
items.title: l7aromeo/meocord: MeoCord Framework - lightweight and extensible framework designed for building Discord bots. With its modular architecture, support for TypeScript, and seamless integration with Discord.js, MeoCord simplifies bot development with a focus on flexibility, scalability, and modularity.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anygrid: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
